code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Form=_ref=>{let{initialData={},onSubmit}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState(initialData.title||'');const[description,setDescription]=useState(initialData.description||'');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit({title,description});setTitle('');setDescription('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,placeholder:"Title",onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:description,placeholder:"Description",onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});};export default Form;
